vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_delete(unsigned short FlibHndl,short number);

For the program number 8 digits :
FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_delete(unsigned short FlibHndl,long number);

cmn.p: Deletes the specified NC program registered in CNC.

The program which is executed or selected in foreground by CNC cannot be deleted.
And the protected program cannot be deleted.
In case of Series 15/15i, deletion is delayed under the following condition.

p.li: Edit processing in the CNC side (include background edit processing)

cmn.p:
In Series 16/18, 16i/18i, 0i-F, 30i, Power Mate i, it is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
In Series 15i, it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits.
See Program number 8 digits for details.

is.p: Deletes the specified NC program registered in CNC.
The program which is executed or selected in foreground by CNC cannot be deleted. And the protected program cannot be deleted.
It is possible to use this function for the program number 8 digits, however it is necessary to switch API to the one for the program number 8 digits. See Program number 8 digits for details.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

item.name: EW_FUNC
item.content:
Unavailable
This application is not customized for the program number 8 digits.
See "Program number 8 digits" for details.

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
Series 30i, 0i-D/F, PMi-A, 15i(Ethernet only)
Background edit processing in CNC side Terminate background edit.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend.
"OP" signal(DO) on (only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.
CNC is in the emergency stop.
Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i
Background edit processing in CNC side Terminate background edit.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend, cnc_vrfend.
Alarm (PS000, PS101) on CNC side Reset the alarm on CNC.
MDI mode on CNC side Change CNC mode except MDI mode.
"OP" signal(DO) on (only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.
Foreground program selected by CNC Change selected program on CNC.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
Program (number) is not found.
Foreground program selected by CNC.(Series 15/15i) Change selected program on CNC.

item.name: EW_PROT
item.content:
Write protection on CNC side
Protection KEY(DI) turns off. (Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C, Power Mate i)
Tape memory is write-protected by the CNC parameter setting(O8000-/O9000- protection, encoding).

item.name:
EW_PASSWD
(Ethernet)
item.content: Specified program number cannot be deleted because the data is protected. (Series 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C)

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
Background edit processing in CNC side Terminate background edit.
Downloading, verifying Terminate a downloading, verifying by using cnc_dwnend3, cnc_vrfend.
"OP" signal(DO) on (only EDIT mode or MEMORY mode) Automatic operation is being executed on CNC.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
Program (number) is not found.

item.name: EW_PROT
item.content:
Write protection on CNC side
Tape memory is write-protected by the CNC parameter setting(O8000-/O9000- protection, encoding).

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D/F, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

cmn.span: This function can be used in any CNC mode.
It is possible to use in other than MDI mode.
